attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That MP's who are engaged in legal cases and/or other brushes with the law, and although not convicted of an offense in law at the end of that - have by their actions still damaged the high standing of the office of MP -

I would use libel as an example here, as an MP can plead guilty and having settled the case carry on as an acting MP, where as most professionals would have to(or be forced to) resign if placed in such a dubious position.
